text.div:
Example Service Modifier Codes

This value set includes sample Service Modifier codes which may support differential payment.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/ex-servicemodifier defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
sr Side of the RoadServices provided on the side of the raod or such other non-conventional setting.
ah After hoursServices provided outside or normal business hours.

name: Example Service Modifier Codes
description: This value set includes sample Service Modifier codes which may support differential payment.

concept.definition: Services provided on the side of the raod or such other non-conventional setting.
Services provided outside or normal business hours.
